data.route_analysis: Guatemala has a well-connected system of buses, shuttles, and taxis for easy travel between cities and attractions.
data.pricing_trends: Prices peak during holiday seasons and dry months, with lower rates during the rainy season.
data.seasonal_patterns: Optimal travel months are December to February for dry weather, while May to October offers more rain but lush landscapes.
data.booking_windows: Optimal booking time is 2-3 months in advance, especially during peak travel times.

destination_insights.route_analysis: Guatemala has a well-connected system of buses, shuttles, and taxis for easy travel between cities and attractions.
destination_insights.seasonal_patterns: Optimal travel months are December to February for dry weather, while May to October offers more rain but lush landscapes.
destination_insights.climate: Tropical climate with warm temperatures year-round. Dry season from November to April; a light jacket is recommended for cooler evenings in highlands.
destination_insights.culture: Rich indigenous culture with vibrant markets, traditional festivals, and Mayan ruins.

market_insights.pricing_trends: Prices peak during holiday seasons and dry months, with lower rates during the rainy season.
market_insights.booking_windows: Optimal booking time is 2-3 months in advance, especially during peak travel times.
market_insights.demand: High demand for cultural tours, eco-tourism, and adventure activities.
market_insights.competition: Popular alternative destinations include Costa Rica and Mexico.

trend_insights.market_trends: Increased interest in sustainable travel and eco-tourism; travelers prioritize experiences over amenities.
trend_insights.consumer_behavior: Travelers often rely on online reviews and social media to inform their decisions.
trend_insights.competitive_landscape: Competition is growing with neighboring countries offering similar attractions.
trend_insights.seasonal_factors: Travel decisions are influenced by the local festival calendar and climate patterns.
